detail_desc: Sleeveless, V-neck dress in woven fabric with a yoke that has gathered seams front and back. Smocked seam at the waist and a gently flared skirt. Unlined.
Hat in braided paper straw. Width of brim 9 cm.
Dress in soft, organic cotton jersey with an elasticated drawstring waist and short sleeves.
Shirt in a linen weave with a turn-down collar, classic front and yoke at the back. Long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, and a rounded hem.
Cardigan in soft, fine-knit cashmere with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and a wrapover front that ties at the waist.
Knee-length skirt in a patterned cotton weave with a concealed zip at the side, side pockets and a tiers to the hem. Unlined.
Slim-fit, high-waisted jeans in washed, stretch denim with an adjustable, elasticated waist (in sizes 8-12Y), fake front pockets, real back pockets and narrow hems.
Joggers in a Tencel™ lyocell weave with a regular, elasticated, drawstring waist, side pockets and a fake back pocket. Tapered legs with elasticated hems.
Alice band with a decorative knot detail at the top.
Hats in soft jersey.

Set with a T-shirt and matching joggers in organic cotton. Classic T-shirt in jersey with a ribbed trim around the neckline. Casual-style joggers in sweatshirt fabric. Relaxed fit with an easy pull-on, ribbed, elasticated, drawstring waist, discreet pockets in the side seams and tapered legs with ribbed hems.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a round, rib-trimmed neckline and small opening with ties at the front of the hem.
Shorts in washed, lightweight denim. High paper bag waist with wide elastication and a small frill trim, a zip fly and button, and front and back pockets.

5-pocket jeans in washed, stretch denim with a regular waist, zip fly and button and skinny legs. Shaping – denim with a stretch function that holds in and shapes the waist, thighs and bum while keeping the jeans in shape.
Short, fitted top in ribbed cotton jersey with short sleeves.
Satin-covered Alice band with decorative butterflies decorated with faceted plastic beads.
Cardigan in soft, fine-knit cotton with buttons down the front, ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem and a straight hem with short slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.

Short, padded jacket in woven fabric with a zip and wind flap with press-studs down the front and a lined hood with a collar and adjustable drawstring. Zipped side pockets, a zipped inner pocket, long sleeves with inner ribbing at the cuffs, and an elasticated drawstring at the hem. Lined.
Jacket in fine-knit slub cotton with a drawstring hood, zip down the front and raw edges at the cuffs and hem.

Oversized top in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with a jersey-lined, drawstring hood. Low dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside. The polyester content of the top is partly recycled.

Ankle-length trousers in a jacquard weave made from a viscose blend containing glittery threads with a high waist, zip fly and concealed hook-and-eye fastening. Side pockets, fake welt back pockets and straight-cut legs that taper to the hem with creases.
Top in soft, rib-knit viscose jersey with a turtle neck and short sleeves.

Calf-length dress in a viscose crêpe weave with a narrow, frilled collar and V-neck opening with ties at the front. Long, wide raglan sleeves with covered elastication and a narrow frill trim at the cuffs, and a tiered skirt for added width. Unlined.
Jumper in soft, fine-knit merino wool with a round neck, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Ankle-length dress in satin with ties at the back of the neck and a concealed zip in one side. V-neck and a wrapover front with gathers at one side to create a gentle draping effect. Unlined.
Leggings in washed, stretch denim with an elasticated waist, fake front pockets and real back pockets.
Long-sleeved blouse in airy chiffon with embroidery, a small, frilled collar and an opening with a button at the back of the neck. Smocking and frills at the cuffs and hem. Unlined.

Ankle-length dress in a soft weave with a V-neck, concealed buttons down the front and a detachable tie belt. Short, wide sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups and pleats at the front for extra width. Unlined.
Cardigan in a soft knit with dropped shoulders, long sleeves, front pockets and no buttons.

Short-sleeved shirt in a patterned viscose and cotton weave with a narrow turn-down collar, French front, yoke at the back and rounded hem. Slim fit with narrow shoulders and a tapered waist for a fitted silhouette.
Cardigan in a soft, fine knit with long sleeves and patch front pockets. No buttons.
Short skirt in a patterned viscose crêpe weave with a wrapover front, elastication at the back of the waist, a concealed zip at one side and an asymmetric hem. Unlined.
Cap in cotton twill with an adjustable plastic fastener at the back.
Earrings in metal with rings in different sizes. Length 6 cm.

Soft nursing bras in organic cotton jersey with adjustable shoulder straps and jersey-lined, opening cups with removable inserts and space for nursing pads. Hook-and-eye fastening at the back and scalloped trims.
Fine-knit jumper containing some wool with hard-worn details and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Cardigan in a soft knit containing some wool. Boxy fit with a deep V-neck, rhinestone-decorated buttons down the front, dropped shoulders and long sleeves. Wide ribbing at the cuffs and hem. The polyester content of the cardigan is recycled.
Cardigan in soft, textured-knit cotton with buttons down the front and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Thick socks knitted in a soft wool blend with a ribbed shaft.

Ankle-length, one-shoulder dress in a patterned crêpe weave with one narrow tie-top shoulder strap, a wide flounce at the top that continues over one shoulder and a wide flounce at the hem. Slightly longer at the back. Unlined.

STUDIO COLLECTION. Dress in an airy, patterned silk and cotton weave with a small, drawstring stand-up collar with long ties, concealed press-studs at the top and long sleeves with pin-tucks and flared cuffs. Pleats at the back and hem for added width, and a double layer at the hem with an overlocked edge. Unlined.
Joggers in washed denim with an elasticated drawstring waist, back pocket and tapered legs.
T-shirt bra in microfibre with underwired, padded cups that shape the bust and provide good support. Adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Waist bag in nylon with a zip at the top and a small, zipped outer compartment. Adjustable strap with a plastic fastener at the waist. Lined. Size 8x14x26 cm.
Sports trousers in sturdy, fast-drying functional fabric in a slim fit at the top. Wide ribbing at the waist for optimum fit and straight legs with drawstring hems.
Long-sleeved jumper in a soft, fine, fluffy knit with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Top in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with a round, rib-trimmed neckline, dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
KAROLINA KIJAK x H&M. Pyjama T-shirt and shorts in cotton jersey. T-shirt with a print motif. Shorts with covered elastication at the waist.
Long-sleeved, calf-length dress in jersey with a sheen. Draping at the top, a draped detail at one side, a seam at the waist and an asymmetric skirt with sewn-in wrapover. Unlined.
Off-the-shoulder blouse in patterned chiffon crêpe with elastication at the top, long sleeves with elasticated cuffs, and a straight-cut hem.
Short-sleeved dress in patterned cotton jersey with a gathered seam at the hips and a flared skirt.
Sleeveless romper suit in soft, organic cotton slub jersey with buttons on the shoulders, press-studs at the crotch and short legs.
Jumper in a soft, fine cotton knit with a button on one shoulder, long raglan sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Long-sleeved, all-in-one pyjamas in soft, organic cotton jersey.
Sleeveless dress in soft, crinkled jersey with a tie detail at the front and an elasticated seam at the waist. Unlined.
Long, airy top in soft jersey with long sleeves, visible seams and an asymmetric cut to the raw-edge hem. Longer at the back.
Jacket in soft, felted fabric with decorative stitching, a high collar and concealed press-studs at the front. Detachable tie belt at the waist and front pockets. Lined.
Set with a sports top and short tights in fast-drying functional fabric. Straight-cut top with short sleeves and a rounded hem. Longer at the back. Tights with a panel at the waist.
Lace T-shirt bra with underwired, padded cups that shape the bust and provide good support. Adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.

Short dress in an airy, patterned viscose weave with an opening and ties at the front that form a V-neck when tied. Short sleeves with a flounced trim over the shoulders, and a flounced seam at the waist. Unlined.
Ankle-length trousers in washed cotton twill. Relaxed fit with a high waist, zip fly and button and tapered legs. Front, back and leg pockets and a hammer loop on one leg.

Short dress in woven fabric with a V-neck, frilled collar and decorative drawstring with tassels. Flounces at the front that continue back over the shoulders, short butterfly sleeves and a smocked seam at the waist.

Super push-up lace bra with underwired, thickly padded cups that maximise the bust to create a fuller cleavage. Narrow adjustable shoulder straps and thin elastic straps that cross at the front. Narrow fastening at the back with two pairs of hooks and eyes.
Knee-length dress in woven fabric with a V-neck and 3/4-length sleeves with wide, buttoned cuffs. Straight-cut style with a detachable tie belt at the waist. Lined.
Washed cotton twill trousers in a regular fit with an adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and button, and front and back pockets.
Short jumper in a chunky-knit cotton blend with hole-patterned details. Ribbing around the neckline, dropped shoulders and long, tapered sleeves.
T-shirt in printed cotton jersey.

Dance dress in jersey with a foil print on the front. Long sleeves with detachable, shimmering gold-coloured wings at the back that are attached with a hook and loop fastening. Glittery elastic waistband and a flared skirt in a double layer of tulle to create width. Lined skirt.
Cardigan in a soft, fine knit with slits in the sides and no buttons.
Long-sleeved dress in soft, patterned organic cotton jersey with an inner bodysuit. Scalloped trim around the neckline and cuffs, a gathered seam at the waist and press-studs at the crotch.
Hat in soft rib-knit cashmere.
Shopper in grained imitation leather with imitation suede inside and two handles at the top. Unlined. Size 16x28x38 cm.
Calf-length, V-neck dress in textured, patterned jersey with a seam under the bust and short sleeves. Unlined.

Running gloves with uppers in windproof, functional fabric. Wide ribbing and a reflective print at the top. Small key pocket with a concealed zip on the back of one glove. The tops of the thumb and index finger are made from touchscreen-compatible material. Unlined.

Studio Collection. Leather boots with an overdimensioned shaft, square toes and covered block heels. Slimmer inner shaft for a more comfortable fit around the calves. Leather insoles and leather soles. Heel approx. 8 cm. Studio Collection AW20 is a tribute to the rebellious, fearless individual who dares to break the mould – an individual who plays between the extremes and finds their style amongst the androgynous, eclectic and creative.
Short-sleeved top in stretch, ribbed cotton jersey with a decorative button band down the front.

Set with a top, pair of leggings and hat in soft cotton. Long-sleeved top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with low dropped shoulders, a press-stud on one shoulder and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Leggings in soft jersey with an elasticated waist and ribbed hems. Hat in double-layered jersey.
Sandals in imitation leather with decorative appliqués at the front and an adjustable heel strap with concealed elastication and a metal buckle. Imitation leather insoles.
Long-sleeved top in soft pile with a sequin motif on the front and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
